pythonBin.label: Python Binary
pythonBin.help: Optional override. Defaults to project .venv python if present.

workspaceDir.label: Workspace Dir
workspaceDir.help: Where generated USER.md / AGENTS.md / SOUL.md / IDENTITY.md are written.

whoamiProjectDir.label: whoami Project Dir
whoamiProjectDir.help: Path to the whoami project root (contains pyproject.toml).

whoareuProjectDir.label: whoareu Project Dir
whoareuProjectDir.help: Path to the whoareu project root (contains pyproject.toml).

whoamiSynthesisMode.label: whoami Synthesis Mode
whoamiSynthesisMode.help: openclaw = use OpenClaw agent synthesis; whoami = direct litellm synthesis.

openclawBin.label: OpenClaw Binary
openclawBin.help: Binary path used for OpenClaw synthesis mode.

openclawAgentId.label: OpenClaw Agent Id
openclawAgentId.help: Agent id used by `openclaw agent` in synthesis mode.

openclawFallbackToWhoami.label: Fallback To whoami
openclawFallbackToWhoami.help: If OpenClaw synthesis fails, auto-fallback to legacy whoami mode.

whoareuSynthesisMode.label: whoareu Synthesis Mode
whoareuSynthesisMode.help: openclaw = use OpenClaw agent synthesis (no API key needed); whoareu = direct litellm synthesis.
